name: Skirmish
description:
Destroy your friends in SKIRMISH!

This Local-Multiplayer Top-Down Space Shooter is a blast! Be the last ship in one piece to be victorious!

This is a 5-player local multiplayer game (4 controllers + 1 keyboard), but you can also play online thanks to the Steam Remote Play Together!

First, select your color!

Next, choose your ship!

FIGHT!

VICTORY!



Blow up your friends in this free-for-all fun!
